subject: Softball
lead_paragraph: Kaleigh Rafter homered and drove in three runs, and Canada beat the United States, 4-3, for its second straight win over the once-dominant Americans at the World Cup of Softball in Oklahoma City.
snippet: Kaleigh Rafter homered and drove in three runs, and Canada beat the United States, 4-3, for its second straight win over the once-dominant Americans at the World Cup of Softball in Oklahoma City.
